content: owl mitts this is a simple fingerless glove pattern featuring a stretchy ribbed cuff and simple cable pattern that results designed by sandy satre in a pair of cute owls you could even add button eyes for more interest materials 100 yds punta merisoft solid shown in maroon mustard aqua & taupe 32 or 40 or long enough to do magic loop size us #8/5mm circular needle or 1 set of dpn s size us #8 stitch markers cable needle gauge 4½ sts/6 row= 1 in stockinette stitch size woman s s/m to fit 7-8 hand 6-7 wrist notes abbreviations this pattern is knit entirely in the kf&b knit into the front and back of stitch round and much easier to work using the magic loop method but sts stitches can also be done on dpn s round round both cuffs are worked the same pm place marker but the owl cable pattern and slm slip marker thumb gusset are worked on k2tog knit 2 together different sides for each hand owl mitts ©2009 sandy satre right mitt co 30 sts 15 sts on each needle join in round being careful not to twist sts work 1x1 rib for 3½ about 22 row begin working owl cable chart at start of next round at the same time you will begin the thumb gusset on row 3 of chart work row 1 of chart k16 work row 2 of chart k16 thumb gusset round 1 work row 3 of chart pm kf&b kf&b pm k 14 round 2 work row 4 of chart k to end of round round 3 work row 5 of chart slm kf&b k to 1 before m k f&b slm k to end of round round 4 work row 6 of chart k to end of round repeat rnds 3&4 working respective chart row until you have 16 sts between markers you should now be on row 16 of the chart close thumb gusset work row 16 of chart slm k3 bo13 slm you should have 2 thumb gusset sts on the right side of the bobble and 1 on the left side k to end of round work row 17 of chart drop markers this round k1 k2tog k to end of round continue working chart k all other sts after finishing chart k 1 row p 1 row k 1 row bobble all sts weave in ends owl mitts ©2009 sandy satre left mitt work cuff same as for right mitt k16 work row 1 of chart k16 work row 2 of chart thumb gusset round 1 k13 pm kf&b kf&b pm k1 work row 3 of chart round 2 k18 work row 4 of chart round 3 k13 slm kf&b k to 1 before m k f&b slm k1 work row 5 of chart round 4 k to 2nd marker k1 work row 6 of chart repeat rnds 3&4 working respective chart row until you have 16 sts between markers you should now
